name: Mouse Dream
description:
Mouse dream is a platformer game where all surroundings are continuously
morphing from the clouds into the new forms and adventures.
You are not running anywhere, all dreams come to you.
Dream is the story.
Dream as long as you can.

Are humans the only ones on this planet watching clouds in the sky?
Sinking into the world of fantasies with all the creatures imaginable.
Exploring endless wonderlands formed just from a water mist.

What about the mice?
What do they dream about?

Surely, there must be a lot of cheese and friendly cats.
But what if there is much more.

So jump, enjoy and jump again
as a little mouse through all dreams.
Watch out for alarm clocks!

Developer´s info:
During the summer holidays 2020 individual dreams of Mouse Dream will be continuously updated.
